001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.ObjectPrinter;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.json.JacksonUtils;
005
006import java.io.File;
007import java.nio.file.Files;
008import java.nio.file.Path;
009import java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes;
010import java.util.Arrays;
011import java.util.Collection;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.NavigableMap;
014import java.util.TreeMap;
015import java.util.stream.Collectors;
016
017import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.json.JacksonUtils.dumpAsJson;
018import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.json.JacksonUtils.dumpAsJsonPrettyPrint;
019import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toSortedMap;
020import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.linkedMap;
021import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.nameValue;
022import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.sortedMap;
023
024/**
025 * TODO: provide the comprehensive Java-Doc and reuse {@link ObjectPrinter} !!!
026 */
027public class SysDumpUtils {
028
029    public static String dumpSysPropsAsJson() {
030        return valueAsJson(dumpSysProps(), 0);
031    }
032
033    public static String dumpSysPropsExAsJson() {
034        return valueAsJson(dumpSysPropsEx(), 0);
035    }
036
037    public static String dumpEnvVarsAsJson() {
038        return valueAsJson(dumpEnvVars(), 0);
039    }
040
041    public static String dumpEnvVarsExAsJson() {
042        return valueAsJson(dumpEnvVarsEx(), 0);
043    }
044
045    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
046
047    /**
048     * @return Java system-properties as a sorted-map
049     */
050    public static NavigableMap<String,String> dumpSysProps() {
051        return sortedMap(System.getProperties().entrySet()
052            .stream()
053            .map(PropertiesUtils::propEntryEsc));
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * @return the same as {@link #dumpEnvVars()}, but the values of {@code xxx.path} properties are transformed to list
058     */
059    public static NavigableMap<String, Object> dumpSysPropsEx() {
060        return dumpSysProps().entrySet().stream()
061            .collect(toSortedMap(e -> transformSysProps(e)));
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * @return environment variables as a sorted-map
066     */
067    public static NavigableMap<String,String> dumpEnvVars() {
068        return new TreeMap<>(System.getenv());
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * @return the same as {@link #dumpEnvVars()}, but the values of {@code xxxPATH} variables are transformed to list
073     */
074    public static NavigableMap<String, Object> dumpEnvVarsEx() {
075        return dumpEnvVars().entrySet().stream()
076            .collect(toSortedMap(e -> transformPathVars(e)));
077    }
078
079    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
080
081    private static Object transformSysProps(Map.Entry<String, ?> entry) {
082        if (!entry.getKey().toUpperCase().endsWith("PATH")) {
083            return entry.getValue();
084        }
085        String pathValue = "" + entry.getValue();
086        return Arrays.stream(pathValue.split(File.pathSeparator)).toList();
087    }
088
089    private static Object transformPathVars(Map.Entry<String, String> entry) {
090        if (!entry.getKey().toUpperCase().endsWith("PATH")) {
091            return entry.getValue();
092        } else {
093            return Arrays.stream(entry.getValue().split(File.pathSeparator)).toList();
094        }
095    }
096
097    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
098
099    /**
100     * @param file a file to get the file-attributes of
101     * @return the attributes of {@code file} as JSON
102     */
103    public static String fileAttrsAsJson(File file) {
104        return fileAttrsAsJson(file.toPath());
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * @param filePath a path to the file to get the file-attributes of
109     * @return the attributes of {@code file} as JSON
110     */
111    public static String fileAttrsAsJson(Path filePath) {
112        try {
113            BasicFileAttributes fileAtrrs = Files.readAttributes(filePath, BasicFileAttributes.class);
114            return dumpAsJsonPrettyPrint(linkedMap(
115                nameValue("filePath", filePath),
116                nameValue("fileSize", fileAtrrs.size()),
117                nameValue("creationTime", fileAtrrs.creationTime()),
118                nameValue("lastModifiedTime", fileAtrrs.lastAccessTime()),
119                nameValue("lastModifiedTime", fileAtrrs.lastModifiedTime()),
120                nameValue("isRegular", fileAtrrs.isRegularFile()),
121                nameValue("isDirectory", fileAtrrs.isDirectory()),
122                nameValue("isSymbolicLink", fileAtrrs.isSymbolicLink()),
123                nameValue("isOther", fileAtrrs.isOther())
124            ));
125        } catch (Exception ex) {
126            return dumpAsJson(JacksonUtils.errorFrom(ex));
127        }
128    }
129
130    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
131
132    public static String seqAsJson(Collection<?> collObj, int indent) {
133        if (collObj == null) {
134            return "null";
135        } else if (collObj.isEmpty()) {
136            return "[]";
137        }
138        return collObj.stream()
139            .map(item -> valueAsJson(item, indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT))
140            .collect(Collectors.joining(
141                String.format(",%n%s", " ".repeat(indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT)),
142                String.format("[%n%s", " ".repeat(indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT)),
143                String.format("%n%s]", " ".repeat(indent))
144            ));
145    }
146
147    public static String mapAsJson(Map<?, ?> mapObj, int indent) {
148        if (mapObj == null) {
149            return "null";
150        } else if (mapObj.isEmpty()) {
151            return "{}";
152        }
153        return mapObj.entrySet().stream()
154            .map(e -> entryAsJson(e, indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT))
155            .collect(Collectors.joining(
156                String.format(",%n%s", " ".repeat(indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT)),
157                String.format("{%n%s", " ".repeat(indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT)),
158                String.format("%n%s}", " ".repeat(indent))
159            ));
160    }
161
162    private static String entryAsJson(Map.Entry<?,?> entry, int indent) {
163        String entryKeyStr = "" + entry.getKey();
164        String entryValueStr = valueAsJson(entry.getValue(), indent);
165        return String.format("\"%s\": %s", entryKeyStr, entryValueStr);
166    }
167
168    private static String valueAsJson(Object obj, int indent) {
169        return obj == null ? "null" : switch (obj) {
170            case Map<?,?> mapObj -> mapAsJson(mapObj, indent);
171            case Collection<?> seqObj -> seqAsJson(seqObj, indent);
172            default -> String.format("\"%s\"", obj); // <-- think about escaping
173        };
174    }
175
176    private static final int INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT = 2;
177
178    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
179
180    private SysDumpUtils() {
181        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
182        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
183    }
184}
